alert.note: Alert for Isanti; Kanabec; Mille Lacs (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 2:24AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Kanabec, central Mille Lacs and northwestern Isanti Counties through 300 AM CDT... At 223 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northwest of Bock, or 29 miles south of Mille Lacs Lake, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Milaca around 230 AM CDT. Bock around 240 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Ogilvie and Mora. This includes U.S. Highway 169 between mile markers 192 and 207. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
